Title.Language: Melody for the Feast of the Nativity (29 Koiahk)

Text.Language: I open my mouth glorifying God / And praising Christ at all times / For He has fulfilled His promise / Who was born in Bethlehem

Text.Language: Do not forget O Mother of the Holy / O Mary, intercede on our behalf / Before our Master Christ / Who was born in Bethlehem
